description: A can of chickpeas and fresh parsley being prepared

content: "Start by combining drained chickpeas, fresh parsley, chopped onion, garlic, cumin, coriander, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper in a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped."

description: Bowl of falafel mixture with flour

content: "Transfer the mixture to a bowl, add flour gradually until a non-sticky ball forms. Adjust flour as needed for the right consistency."

description: Frying pan with vegetable oil heating up

content: "Heat vegetable oil in a pan, shape the falafel mixture into balls or patties while waiting for the oil to heat up."
"Carefully fry the falafel in batches for 3-5 minutes per side until they turn golden brown and crispy. Avoid overcrowding the pan for even frying."

description: Golden brown falafel on a paper towel

content: "Once fried, remove falafel from oil and place them on a paper towel-lined plate to absorb excess oil."

description: Falafel served with pita bread, tahini sauce, and salad

content: "Finally, serve the hot falafel with pita bread, tahini sauce, salad, and your favorite toppings. Enjoy your delicious homemade falafel!"
